title: Deposition of Dr. Martha L. Ingram
content:
IN THE CIRCUIT COURT FOR FAIRFAX COUNTY, VIRGINIA

Plaintiffs: Maria Lopez, et al.
Defendants: Nathan B. Caldwell, et al.
CASE NUMBER: CL23-09567

COPY DATE: March 12, 2023

## DEPOSITION
Pursuant to notice, the following videotaped deposition of MARTHA L. INGRAM, PH.D. was taken before me, Samuel T. Andrews, Notary Public, in and for the State of Virginia, at 9801 Braddock Road, Suite 400, Fairfax, Virginia 22032, commencing at 10:02 a.m., when present on behalf of the respective parties:

### APPEARANCES
- JAMES R. SANDERS, ESQUIRE (Plaintiffs)
- ELLEN C. MARTIN, ESQUIRE & THOMAS E. FIELDS, ESQUIRE (Defendant - Nathan B. Caldwell)
- ALSO PRESENT: Michael Tan, Video Operator

### INDEX
#### WITNESS
- MARTHA L. INGRAM, PH.D.
  - Voir Dire Examination by Ms. Martin: Page 5
  - Direct Examination by Ms. Martin: Page 8
  - Cross Examination by Mr. Sanders: Page 20
  - Redirect Examination by Ms. Martin: Page 50

### EXHIBITS
- No. 1: Curriculum Vitae - Page 4
- No. 2: Financial Records - Page 6
- No. 3: Correspondence - Page 35 (Retained by Counsel)

EXAMINATION OF MARTHA L. INGRAM, PH.D.
Martha L. Ingram, Ph.D., was called as a witness by counsel for the Defendant, Nathan B. Caldwell, and after having been duly sworn by the Notary Reporter, was examined and testified as follows:

### CERTIFICATE OF COURT REPORTER
I, Samuel T. Andrews, Notary Public in and for the Commonwealth of Virginia, do hereby certify that the witness, Dr. Martha L. Ingram, was duly sworn by me and that the foregoing deposition is a true and accurate record of the testimony given by the witness.

Given under my hand this 12th day of March, 2023.
Samuel T. Andrews, Notary Public
My commission expires: August 14, 2025
source: Circuit Court for Fairfax County, Virginia
